context_bundle.summary: Convert text track lists to Spotify/streaming playlists using TuneMyMusic or Soundiiz web tools.

onboarding.quick_start: Format: "Artist - Track Title" one per line. Go to tunemymusic.com → From Text → paste → select Spotify → authorize → done. Soundiiz.com offers better matching but requires free account.
common_patterns: Strip album names and durations from raw track lists
Artist - Title format gets best match rates
